title: Computer Networks
description: Computer Networks are the backbone of modern communication, connecting devices and enabling seamless data exchange. Explore how networks facilitate everything from internet browsing to business operations, and learn about the essential components like routers, protocols, and security measures that ensure efficient and secure connectivity. Understand how network design and technology keep the digital world running smoothly.
